author: Karina H. Barrera
title: ¿Qué hacen los animales antes de un huracán? Este libro lo explica fácil a niñas y niños
text: ¿Qué hacen los animales antes de un [huracán](https://www.sdpnoticias.com/mexico/huracan-beryl-en-mexico-estos-son-los-8-estados-que-podria-afectar-si-el-ciclon-tropical-evoluciona/)? Si no sabes cómo abordar el tema con tus hijos, este libro lo explica fácil a niñas y niños. A unas horas de que el [huracán Beryl](https://www.sdpnoticias.com/mexico/como-saber-si-mi-vuelo-fue-cancelado-por-el-huracan-beryl-asi-puedes-hacerle/) toque tierra en México, es importante que tanto adultos como niños sepan las medidas de precaución que deben tomar para evitar riesgos. Si el asunto ha hecho que tus hijos te bombardeen con muchas otras preguntas sobre los huracanes y sus efectos, te traemos un libro que te ayudará a informarlos. En sus Marcas, Listos..., ¡Esperen!: El libro sobre los animales salvajes ante los huracanes El libro, En sus Marcas, Listos..., ¡Esperen! ¿Qué hacen los animales antes de un huracán?, te ayudará a explicarle a niñas y niños sobre este fenómeno meteorológico. Con base en investigaciones, observaciones e ilustraciones, el libro explica cómo los animales salvajes se dan cuenta, reaccionan y se preparan para un huracán. [MéxicoHuracán Beryl en vivo hoy 4 de julio: Dónde está, trayectoria a México. Categoría 2 impactará en Tulum y Felipe Carrillo Puerto a la medianoche; segundo impacto será en Tamaulipas](/mexico/huracan-beryl-en-vivo-hoy-4-de-julio-sigue-su-trayectoria-a-mexico/) [Estilo de vida¿Para qué sirve poner cinta en X en cristales? 8 medidas para mantenerte a salvo en casa durante un huracán](/estilo-de-vida/para-que-sirve-poner-cinta-en-x-en-cristales-7-medidas-para-mantenerte-a-salvo-en-casa-durante-un-huracan/) [Quintana RooLista de refugios en Quintana Roo por impacto de huracán Beryl: Conoce su ubicación](/estados/quintana-roo/lista-de-refugios-en-quintana-roo-por-impacto-de-huracan-beryl-conoce-su-ubicacion/) [EstadosPoseidón vs Chaac: La llegada del huracán Beryl inspira los memes más burlones](/estados/poseidon-vs-chaac-la-llegada-del-huracan-beryl-inspira-los-memes-mas-burlones/) [InternacionalHuracán Beryl en Jamaica: Las fotos y videos de la destrucción de su paso](/internacional/huracan-beryl-en-jamaica-las-fotos-y-videos-de-la-destruccion-de-su-impacto/) [MéxicoTren Maya cancela viajes a Cancún por inminente impacto del huracán Beryl en la Península de Yucatán](/mexico/tren-maya-cancela-viajes-a-cancun-por-inminente-impacto-del-huracan-beryl-en-la-peninsula-de-yucatan/) En especial, el libro de Patti R. Zelch se enfoca en el comportamiento de nueve animales: - Pez - Delfín - Tiburón - Langosta - Manatí - Pájaro - Cocodrilo - Mariposa - Conejo Para explicar lo que cada uno de estos animales hace antes de un huracán, el libro En sus Marcas, Listos..., ¡Esperen! ofrece historias breves, en lenguaje simple y poético. Esto hace al libro de Patti R. Zelch apto para niños de entre 5 y 8 años de edad, aunque en realidad lo pueden disfrutar los lectores de todas las edades. Si quieres adquirirlo, puedes comprarlo en versión audiolibro a través de Google Play a un precio de 150 pesos. ¿Qué hacen los animales antes de un huracán? Si quieres darle más información a tus hijos sobre lo que hacen los animales antes de un huracán, aquí te damos unos útiles datos: - Las aves suelen cambiar sus patrones de migración y buscar refugio antes de la llegada de un huracán. Pueden volar más bajo o alejarse de la zona afectada - Muchos animales terrestres, como los mamíferos, pueden mostrar signos de inquietud. Algunos buscan lugares seguros, como cuevas o madrigueras, mientras que otros se desplazan a terrenos más altos para evitar inundaciones - Los peces y otros animales marinos pueden moverse a aguas más profundas para evitar las aguas turbulentas cerca de la superficie. También pueden cambiar sus patrones de alimentación y migración - Los animales domésticos como perros y gatos pueden volverse más agitados o ansiosos. Pueden buscar refugio o permanecer cerca de sus dueños en busca de protección

author: Nouvelles
title: Jack Frost, Italie 1/ Le touchant film de Noël avec Michael Keaton, diffusé aujourd'hui 25 décembre 2024
text:
Jack Frost, le casting et réalisateur du film avec Michael Keaton Jack Fros t, film diffusé aujourd’hui, 25 décembre 2024, à 16h10 sur l’Italie 1 est une comédie fantastique de 1998 qui rappelle la tradition américaine de Noël. Le film réalisé par Troy Miller, sur une histoire développée par Mark Steven Johnson, avec qui Steve Bloom, Jeff Cesario et Jonathan Roberts ont collaboré au scénario.
Un amour sculpté dans la glace, Rai 2/ Résumé du film tourné à l’hôtel de glace, aujourd’hui 26 décembre 2024
Le film Jack Fros il a pour principaux interprètes Michael Keaton acteur qui a joué le rôle de Batman et qui dans ce film a le rôle du protagoniste principal, à ses côtés se trouvent Joseph Cross qui joue Charlie Frost, et Kelly Preston dans le rôle de Gabby Frost. Autres acteurs du film Jack Fros Il s’agit respectivement de Mark Addy dans le rôle de Mac MacArthur, Henry Rollins et Andrew Lawrence dans le rôle de Sid et Tuck Gronic respectivement, Eli Marienthal dans le rôle de Spencer, Mika Boorem dans le rôle de Natalie, Benjamin Brock dans le rôle d’Alexander, Will Rothhaar dans le rôle de Dennis, Cameron Ferre et Joe Rokicki dans le rôle de Pudge et Mitch respectivement. et Taylor Handley dans le rôle de Rory Buck.
Paddington, Rai 1/ Intrigue et casting du film avec l’ours qui sait parler, aujourd’hui 26 décembre 2024
Jack Frost, la trame Jack Frost il est père et chanteur et harmoniciste d’un groupe musical qui se consacre au rock et meurt dans un accident de voiture. Jack lui-même est ensuite ramené à la vie sous forme de bonhomme de neige. Sa ville est Medford, dans l’État du Colorado, mais son activité de chanteur l’emmène souvent en tournée avec son groupe. De cette façon, il néglige parfois à la fois sa femme Gabby et son fils Charlie, qui aimeraient avoir une plus grande présence de son père à ses côtés pour lui apprendre le hockey et assister à ses matchs. Charlie est très passionné par le sport du hockey et pour cette raison, il est souvent la cible d’un tyran arrogant et prétentieux, Rory Buck, qui joue également le rôle de capitaine de l’équipe adverse. Alors que Noël approche, Jack Frost doit partir avec son groupe pour un concert, mais décide ensuite d’y renoncer pour rejoindre sa femme Gabby et son fils Charlie dans leur maison de montagne.

author: Click4r Solutions Private Limited
title: How A Weekly Goethe Certificate Project Can Change Your Life | Click4R
text:
How A Weekly Goethe Certificate Project Can Change Your Life
Goethe Certificate
Goethe certificates are internationally accepted German tests for language. They are a part of the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR) levels.
The Goethe-Zertifikat B2 exam is for individuals of all ages who wish to prove their advanced level of German with an official, internationally recognised certificate.
To prepare for a Goethe-Zertifikat test, you must focus on the subject matter that is relevant to your CEFR level. This means that you need to focus on your listening, reading and writing skills.
It is valid for two years
Many institutions require German language certificates from people who wish to study or work in Germany. These certificates prove the person's proficiency in four languages: reading, speaking writing, listening and reading. They are also useful for applying for visas or other forms of immigration. There are various types of German language exams, but the Goethe certificate has an academic merit and is more prestigious than other tests. To successfully pass the Goethe German Language Test the candidate must score at minimum 50 marks in each of the sections.
The test is available in more than 40 countries. The official exam website announces the dates for the test. Depending on the country, the tests are typically conducted in two days. The written test is usually held first, followed by the oral test a few weeks later.
It takes between 600 and 800 hours of classroom time to complete the Goethe B2 examination. This estimate is based on the assumption that students are taking CLT classes and studying for an average of 80 minutes per day. The actual amount of study will vary from person-to-person.
Goethe German language certifications, valid for two years, may be used to boost your profile on social media and job websites.
If you're planning to take the Goethe test You can prepare for the test by identifying your strengths and weaknesses. This will help you to focus on areas that require improvement. You can also utilize the free practice material available on the Goethe website.
The Goethe C1 exam, also called the Zertifikat Deutsch, is recognized by universities and employers in Germany. It is widely accepted in Austria, Switzerland, Poland, Hungary, Turkey, and Spain. It is recommended that a pre-training program be completed prior to the exam. This will help you perform better in the oral section of the test. You'll also have to prepare for the written section by completing reading and grammar exercises. You'll also need to familiarize yourselves with the format and the best way to answer the questions.
It is acknowledged by universities in Germany
The Goethe Certificate is a highly regarded and recognized certificate for German proficiency. It is especially valued by higher education institutions, as it opens doors for students seeking admission to a degree program in Germany. It is a way to obtain a visa to study or work in Germany. The Goethe exam costs a little more than other certifications. The cost of taking the test varies depending on the grade and the country in which it is taken.
The Goethe test is designed to evaluate the ability of people to communicate in four core areas: reading, writing and listening. Each section is assessed separately and has a numerical score, which is then combined to produce the final test score. The Goethe exam also has an qualitative score that is indicative of the overall score. The Goethe test is also more rigorous than other certifications, as it requires at least 50 in each section.
In addition to the Goethe test, there are several alternatives for students looking to enhance their German proficiency. These include language courses as well as private tutors and online resources. These tools offer an organized learning experience than traditional textbooks and can be extremely beneficial for students who study on their own. In addition, students must be up-to-date with the German language and culture through news media, movies or TV shows, as well as music.
The Goethe-Zertifikat is accepted by German universities, however the OSD exam is more widely accepted by employers. The two exams have different goals, with the Goethe Zertifikat is more focused on everyday German while the OSD is more focused on academic German.
The most well-known and prestigious German language certificates are the "TestDaF" and the "Deutsche Sprachprufung fur den Hochschulzugang". These tests are available anywhere in the world, with many of them offering preparation courses in conjunction with local Goethe Institutes, higher education institutions, and private language schools. These courses are usually held twice a month, and cost around 200 euros. The test can be conducted in a paper format or digitally at any test center that is certified in Germany or in other countries.
Visas are required.
The Goethe certificate is recognized all over the world by educational institutions, employers as well as immigration authorities. The certificate demonstrates your proficiency in German which allows you to compete for jobs and studies in Germany. It's also a great tool to enhance your cognitive abilities and boost your confidence. You can even make use of the certificate to get an entry visa to any foreign country.
The certificate is available in six levels, based on the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages. The Goethe-Institut offers exams starting at beginner level A1 up to the Grosser Deutscher Sprachdiplom at the level C2. The exam is divided into four sections including listening, speaking and comprehension of reading. Each section is scored separately, and the requirements for each differ. For example the writing section evaluates your ability to construct grammatical sentences and the listening and reading comprehension sections assess your understanding of specific topics. The speaking section assesses your ability to speak in a group discussion. The Goethe-Institut exams are designed to provide as much transparency as possible and give an accurate indication of how well you can speak the language. The institute offers free practice materials for each section, and the scores are verified using an internationally recognized standard.
A Goethe Certificate is required by a variety of German Universities and is a valid way to apply visa. But, you must verify the authenticity of the certificate before present it to an embassy. Recently, two employees of the Goethe Institute of Beirut abused access to the Goethe-Institute system to fake test results and alter scores to sell fake certificates. This was the first reported instance of a similar scam. In addition to the Goethe-Institut The Fraunhofer Institute for Applied Mathematics and Informatics has created an online tool that allows users to verify the validity of the Goethe language certificate.
The Goethe Institute is an internationally respected organization that promotes German Culture across the world.
It is a certification of achievement
A Goethe Certificate is an internationally accepted proof of language proficiency. It can be used to fulfill a variety of requirements including visa applications as well as professional recognition. The certificates are standardized and based on the Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR), which ensures transparency and comparability of exam results. The Goethe-Institut's German exam is offered in a variety of locations across the globe, and the organization provides free practice materials to help prepare for the tests.
The tests are divided into four levels, starting with A1 for beginners and C2 for advanced learners. Each level has specific prerequisites and skills that must be learned in order to pass the exam. The exams can be administered in many different ways, including traditional classroom instruction and online learning. Students should take regular German classes, and utilize reliable resources for learning the German language.
Goethe certificates are internationally valid and can be verified online. They are valuable as evidence of proficiency in German for the visa application process and professional recognition as well as admission to universities. In addition to demonstrating your ability to speak German, a Goethe certificate is also a crucial step towards cultural understanding and integration in Germany.
The Goethe-Zertifikat A1 certifies communication skills at the beginner level. It tests your ability to introduce yourself and comprehend simple questions and answers. It is not a prerequisite for other tests in the language but it's a great way to begin your journey in Germany.
For those who want to improve their German skills, the Goethe-Zertifikat B2 is a intermediate level exam. This exam is designed for those who employ German in their jobs, study, or social interactions. The test tests your ability to read non-fiction books and understand implicit meanings. The test also tests your ability to speak about difficult topics and express yourself in a structured manner. This test is also available in a Goethe Test PRO version that is specifically created for healthcare professionals, such as nurses who need to demonstrate their German language proficiency at B2 level.

author: 大纪元新闻网
title: 能量学疗愈师：神韵能量能稳定地球
text:
【大纪元2025年04月24日讯】（大纪元记者陈语焉台湾桃园报导）“从疫情之后，整个宇宙的能量在改变，这个大时代和地球的能量也在蜕变。” 2025年4月23日午间，研发脑波疗愈产品的科技公司副总林桂如，在观赏神韵环球艺术团于桃园展演中心的第一场演出后非常感动，“所以要快速了解我们的本源。”她数次感动到落泪。
“因为我们是从本源、我们的‘系统’下来的，”林桂如分享领悟，“神韵可以让我们去发现我们原始、原本的面貌！”
启动松果体的自由能量本身也是美国NLP(神经语言学)专业执行师的林桂如强调，开场节目大幕一拉开就感受到特殊的能量，“我们来到地球是有任务的，我们一定知道来这边做什么。大幕一拉开有创世主、有仙女（菩萨）、天界中舞动的生命体，哇，那个能量里面就开始展开！”
“演出音乐的本身已经超越了我们已知的东西，其实就会启动松果体，他会启动我们生命的细胞。”林桂如继续强调，“哇，那股能量就下来。还有就是在佛光里，整个真善美（忍）的佛光，我们都在佛光里头。”
“到松果体的能量，它是一个可以创造的、可以洞见的、可以觉察的。”林桂如说明自己在演出中所接收到的能量，“它会去touch我们的灵魂，灵魂会感动，可能有些人会掉眼泪，有些人会有被电到的感觉，有些人会觉得哇，好像那个电流，全身都充满电力。”
她表示，“每个人感受不一样，但是启动我们松果体这一点，是演出的音乐、舞蹈、艺术，它超越了喜悦的能量，变成从宁静更高的叫‘自由’的能量。”
“我看到‘自由’两个字，你会发现没有什么制约，只有自由，你可以去发挥、帮人们去稳定、去宁静，所以不再是混乱的。”林桂如说。
结合视觉听觉感觉的省察
神韵为全球观众带来不同层次的生命启迪，林桂如表示，“神韵特殊的是结合听到、看到、感觉到，她是三合一体的，就是让你去‘省察’。从短短的两个小时，触动你的心灵，感受你的细胞，你会发现遇到的问题都不是问题了！”
对能量学研究深入的林桂如体悟，“每一个人都来自于本源，来自于宇宙的某个星球（体）下来的。来到地球每个人都有使命跟任务，这个我们可能是佛性的，可能是至高无上的，我们是从某一尊佛或某一尊(高级生命)的能量场下来。”
“但因为在地球有很多欲望、贪嗔痴，忘记了生命的力量、忘记真正的使命。”林桂如以节目《智收猪八戒》举例，“猪八戒他本来在上面也是一尊，下来是因为情爱这一关没考过，所以要到人生来历练，我们人的习气就是这样子。”
“但还好他遇到他的师父、师兄，就是孙悟空嘛。所以在我们生命的周围，必须要有善知识，必须有好的能量磁场文化。”她说。
“演出带动艺术跟善念的文化传递”，作为身心灵疗愈师，林桂如感慨，“现在很多人是情关难过，就是《牛郎织女》有没有？情关难过。当然他们很相爱，但因为环境的不同，没办法在一起。但还是会把心交出来，形成一个文化，一年见一次面，所以他们会很珍惜。我们现代人有没有办法这么珍惜情感？这也是很好的提醒。”
呼唤内在细胞记忆体
目前神韵已有八个团在全球同时演出，成千上万观众亲身回馈在演出后获得灵性提升，林桂如感佩说，“演出就是打开我们的记忆体，进入DNA，抚平DNA，藉由神韵演出的舞蹈、音乐，忽然间累世的环境内在细胞的记忆体被触动了，好像被呼唤了！”
“因此开始会思考我到底是谁？可以做些什么？如何帮助更多的人？”身为身心灵心理导师，林桂如说自己感动流泪很多次，“所以我非常赞叹也非常感谢神韵带给这个世界的！”
“每一次看神韵，又再唤醒我们其实有一个大使命”，每年都来观赏神韵的她双眼泛出泪光分享，“我们要启动生命，也要帮助这个大时代稳定能量与磁场。”
“如果要回到让整个地球更好，从神韵看到这个美，一定要带着启动善良的心跟高度的能量，才有办法达成。”研究能量与脑波产品的林桂如强调，“要把这个好的能量，除了从自己的内在散发之外，也让更多人启动，这是我们的任务，启动内在的灵魂、完成使命、让真善美（忍）可以去发展。”
启动稳定地球的能量
“现在整个地球是战争的、两岸的不和谐，”林桂如强调，演出现场仿佛可以调整稳定地球频率，“神韵的艺术里面会有一种稳定的能量，有一种启动生命的能量，该做些什么事情的启动。”
“所以在这个人世间，就要去实行真善美（忍）这个能量场，”她领悟，“平常就是要回到自己是佛性的我们，我们是有任务的，只是在这个大时代里我们把它称为服务，我们要扩大服务。”
“要怎么服务？”她接着说，“比如说，我每天会接受宇宙的能量，然后先把自己、周围，我们的家庭，周边的人，再扩大到台湾，再扩大到世界各地，让他们是更好的一个能量体。就是会去做一些分享或是冥想。”
“每个人内在心灵能量稳定之后，就可以再次的重生，”林桂如强调，“可以再次赋予他很大的使命，所以在台湾以及世界各地，我们是有责任的，炎黄子孙要再去…”
DNA被重组的生命能量
“其实演出中我看到像是一种‘重新的封神榜’的一个能量下来……。”本身对能量场感应强烈的林桂如感受到，演出中仿佛有一种“新纪元、新地球”的能量正在形成。
“每一次看神韵，可能又可以打开曾经有的DNA，细胞又重新再被重组。”她说明，“神韵的艺术触动我们的内在，被压抑、不自由的、自我贬低的能量，在里面从喜悦、自由扩展出来，然后把内在的那一份爱、那一份喜悦、那一份自由，再把它扩大、发挥。”
对此林桂如尤其赞佩演出中的歌词，“尤其是唱歌的部分…我们来到人世间，要想办法回到自己的真我，自己内在的灵魂，不再被干扰、不再被影响了，可以活出自己生命能量的原动力！”
“非常感谢神韵艺术总监，能够创举这样的能量”，林桂如对神韵总监表示感佩，她泛着泪光泪说，“每一出的节目、构想都触动人心，触动到我们内在的DNA，唤醒我们，这些艺术家深切演出生命的能量，能量体穿透我们生命，已经进入我们心灵的殿堂。”
“每一个人应该都要来看。”林桂如最后感恩表示，“在神韵的殿堂里面，每一次来看都能有所获得跟启动！”
责任编辑：施慕羽

author: Digicust GmbH
title: Digicust to Expand AI Agents for Customs to Belgium and the Netherlands
text:
Digicust, an Austrian deep tech startup and pioneer in AI agents for customs automation, has announced plans to launch its innovative AI agents for customs clearance in Belgium and the Netherlands by the end of 2025. This strategic initiative is being carried out in parallel with an in-depth market study to gain a thorough understanding of market dynamics and customer requirements in Belgium. Support for the expansion comes from the Austria Wirtschaftsservice (aws) “aws Technologie-Internationalisierung Programm” which highlights the strategic importance and innovative potential of this initiative.
After a highly successful market entry in Germany last year, Digicust is now positioning itself strategically to become the leading provider of AI agents for customs clearance solutions.
"Expanding into Belgium and the Netherlands is the logical next step in our growth journey," said Borisav Parmakovic, CEO of Digicust. "These markets are strategically vital due to their role as major European gateways for international trade. Our advanced AI customs agents streamline processes, significantly reduce errors, and provide substantial cost savings, positioning our clients at the forefront of customs digitization."
The concurrent market study is led by Bernhard Klug, who emphasized: "Our comprehensive analysis is not just about understanding market conditions; it's about actively engaging with potential customers and partners from day one."
Digicust’s AI agents automate complex customs documentation, tariff classification, compliance checks and fraud detection, drastically reducing manual workloads and increasing operational efficiency, while improving security and supply chain speed through 24/7 customs clearance. This cutting-edge technology integrates seamlessly into existing software solutions, offering rapid adoption and immediate benefits.
About Digicust FlexCo
Founded in 2020 and headquartered at Vienna Airport, Digicust is revolutionizing customs clearance through AI-powered solutions, enabling businesses to automate, simplify, and accelerate customs processes with unmatched accuracy and efficiency.
Empower your customs workforce
Rückfragen & Kontakt
Digicust GmbH
Bernhard Klug, MSc
E-Mail: b.klug@digicust.com

author: Alex Sapp
title: Barn, 20 chickens lost in Carlton County fire
text:
Barn, 20 chickens lost in Carlton County fire
Authorities responded to a 911 call of black smoke coming from a barn on Krogh road in Red Clover Township, about 25 minutes west of Cloquet around noon on March 5.
On scene, responders from the Cromwell Wright Fire Department discovered the barn fully engulfed in flames. They then requested assistance from multiple other fire departments.
Firefighters were on scene for around two hours, but the barn is considered to be a total loss. Twenty chickens were inside the fire, and Sheriff’s office reports that all died in the fire. No other injuries were reported. The likely cause of the fire is said to be a space heater inside the barn.
The fire was investigated by the Carlton County Sheriff’s Office. Agencies assisting the Cromwell Wright FD include Carlton, Wrenshall, Esko, Mahtowa, and Kettle River Fire Departments. Lake Country Power and The Carlton County Highway Department were also involved in the response.

author: Atticus Publishing LLC
title: Debbie S. Dougherty's Award-Winning Book "Sexual Harassment in Organizational Culture" Offers Transformative Insights - Brazil Business Today - EIN Presswire
text: Unraveling the Complexities of Workplace Dynamics to Foster Inclusive CulturesUNITED STATES, March 14, 2024 / EINPresswire.com / -- Renowned scholar and organizational communication expert, Dr. Debbie S. Dougherty , unveils her groundbreaking book, "Sexual Harassment in Organizational Culture," a transformative exploration of one of the most pervasive issues plaguing workplaces worldwide. Recipient of two prestigious awards, including the Book of the Year in Organizational Communication and the Textbook of the Year in Organizational Communication, Dougherty's work presents a fresh perspective on addressing sexual harassment within organizational contexts. Drawing from over 20 years of research, teaching, and consulting experience, Dougherty challenges the prevailing notions surrounding sexual harassment, offering a comprehensive understanding rooted in both human science and professional expertise. In "Sexual Harassment in Organizational Culture," Dougherty delves into the complexities of sexual harassment, highlighting its deep entrenchment within organizational cultures. Rejecting simplistic solutions, Dougherty presents a transformational model of organizational culture that emphasizes the crucial role of communication in recognizing and addressing sexual harassment. Through real-life examples and practical activities, readers are equipped with the tools to navigate and transform organizational cultures, fostering environments of respect, equity, and inclusion. Reflecting on her motivation behind the book, Dougherty shares, "I wrote this book because I see leaders and organizational change agents continue to address sexual harassment and other cultural problems in overly simplistic ways. With my extensive research and experience, I aim to provide effective solutions grounded in both theory and practice." With a wealth of accolades to her name, including the NCA Applied Communication Scholar Award and the Professor of the Year Award, Dougherty's work has earned acclaim for its innovative approach to organizational communication and culture. Beyond her scholarly endeavors, Dougherty's impact extends to speaking engagements, training sessions, and organizational consultations across various sectors. "Sexual Harassment in Organizational Culture" serves as a vital resource for organizational change agents, educators, and leaders committed to fostering safe, respectful, and inclusive workplaces. Whether used as a classroom textbook, coaching guide, or leadership toolkit, Dougherty's book offers invaluable insights for those dedicated to creating a more just and humane organizational environment. Don't miss the opportunity to gain invaluable insights and equip yourself with the tools to make a positive impact in your organization. You can visit her blog www.debbiedougherty.com/blog . author: Deutsche Welle
title: Stowaway found alive in landing gear of flight to Paris – DW – 12/28/2023
text:
A man has been discovered hidden in the landing gear compartment of a commercial aircraft that flew into Paris from Algeria .
The man was found alive in the undercarriage bay during technical checks after the Air Algerie flight from Oran, Algeria, landed at Paris Orly airport on Thursday.
An airport source told French news agency AFP that the man "was alive but in a life-threatening condition because of severe hypothermia" after the two-and-a-half-hour flight.
He is believed to be in his 20s but had no ID on him, and was taken to a nearby hospital in a serious condition, the source added.
Commercial aircraft cruise at 30,000 to 40,000 feet (9,000 to 12,000 meters) altitude where temperatures typically drop to around -50 degrees Celsius (-58F), and a lack of oxygen makes survival unlikely for anyone traveling in a landing gear compartment which is neither heated nor pressurized.
According to US Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) data, 132 people tried to travel in the landing gear compartments of commercial aircraft between 1947 and 2021.
The mortality rate for people attempting to travel this way is 77%, according to the FAA figures.
In April of this year, the body of a man was discovered in the landing gear of an aircraft in Amsterdam's Schiphol airport that had flown in from Toronto, but previously took off from Nigeria.
In 2015, the body of a stowaway on a British Airways flight from Johannesburg to Heathrow landed on a shop in Richmond , southwest London. A second stowaway survived the 10-hour flight and was found in the undercarriage of the plane.
mds/lo (AFP, Reuters)
